Remarks. This cosmopolitan species is characterized by having an ornamented propodosomal shield, 14 pairs of setae on the dorsum, genital shields with three pairs of setae, coxae IV with two setae, trochanter III with one seta, genua I with five setae, genu II with four setae, and tibia I with one solenidion. General features of our specimens are as in other known specimens.
